summary: This is a forwarded email from July 2, 2020, containing a press release or announcement that Ghislaine Maxwell has been charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors. The email includes a congratulatory note.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the co-conspirator with Ghislaine Maxwell in the sexual abuse of minors.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Charged
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was charged on July 2, 2020.
The charges are for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.
The case is being prosecuted in Manhattan federal court.
